British Cables Company Limited - 2x Improvement Notice issued - Various

r IN1/SMW/BCCL/24/03/2022 :

You have failed to ensure that measures are taken to prevent access to any dangerous parts of machinery, 
namely the various exposed/unguarded pulleys/sprockets/chains and partially guarded 
pulleys/sprockets/chains etc. on the ‘Core Line 1511’ in the Manufacturing Centre which present a drawing 
in/entanglement hazard.

IN2/SMW/BCCL/24/03/2022 :

You have failed to make and give effect to such arrangements as are appropriate for the effective control 
and monitoring of preventive and protective measures necessary, in that you have failed to devise and 
implement a system to ensure that appropriate machinery guards are fitted, in good working order and that 
employee’s correctly set and use guards.
